text: Joop Vermeulen (21 October 1907 - 10 November 1984) was a Dutch long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Dutch male long- distance runners Category:Dutch male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of the Netherlands
title: Joop Vermeulen
